text: William Fay (9 September 1943 â€“ 22 February 2025) was an English singer- songwriter. Though most of his works were made in the 1960s and 1970s, his music became more popular years later and soon had a cult following in the 1990s and 2000s.Cult folk musician and songwriter Bill Fay dies aged 81 NMEStereogum, Bill Fay, Cult Folk Artist, Dead At 81 He released an album, Life Is People, in 2012. In 2020, he released his last album, Countless Branches. Fay died in London, England on 22 February 2025, at the age of 81. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2025 deaths Category:Singer- songwriters from London Category:English pianists Category:Musicians from London Category:English rock singers Category:Folk singers
title: Bill Fay
